Package it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.mina

Class MinaConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.Connector
      • it.unipr.sowide.actodes.distribution.mina.MinaConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public final class MinaConnector
extends Connector
    The MinaConnector class manages the communication towards remote actor spaces taking advantage of the Apache MINA asynchronous network sockets.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  MinaConnector.ClientReference
      The ClientReference class mantains the information about IP address and port of the actor spaces of the application.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MinaConnector

        protected MinaConnector()
        Class constructor. This connector uses the default configuration and does not act as communication broker.

      • MinaConnector

        public MinaConnector​(boolean f)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        f - a boolean flag indicating if the connector act as communication broker (value = true) or not (value = false). This connector uses the default configuration: the values of the IP address and port of the broker connector are 127.0.0.1 and 1100. Note that the IP address, 127.0.0.1, is used for indicating the local host.

      • MinaConnector

        public MinaConnector​(int p)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        p - the IP port. This connector acts as communication broker.

      • MinaConnector

        public MinaConnector​(java.lang.String a,
                     int p)
        Class constructor.
        Parameters:
        a - the IP address.
        p - the IP port. This connector does not act as communication broker.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public void configure​(java.lang.String a,
                      int p)
        Configures the Apache Mina connector.
        Parameters:
        a - the IP address of the host where the broker connector is running.
        p - the IP port used by the broker connector for receiving messages.

        Starts the connector.
